attributes.action: Help the UK beauty, nail & hair industries financially survive COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Our industries contribute 1.3%.of the total GDP (data from 2019 contributions as detailed in https://britishbeautycouncil.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/British-Beauty-Council-Annual-Report-2019-.pdf) yet we are being left with absolutely nothing, directors unable to furlough as the alternative is their businesses fail, insurers declining all business interruption claims, many of us being subletters or having a family to care for. Please, we need financial help so we can continue to contribute!
attributes.background: The UK nail beauty and hair industries are  falling between the cracks with the chancellors support packages. We are asking for more financial support & assistance or for government to force insurers to pay on business interruption claims across the board to help us & our businesses survive #WeCount

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302857

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
